original_text: But even the people of Judah did not obey the commands of the Lord their God. They did the same bad things that the Israelites had done.
korean_text: 유다도 그들의 하나님 여호와의 명령을 지키지 아니하고 이스라엘 사람들이 만든 관습을 행하였으므로

sentences.original_text: But even the people of Judah
did not obey the commands of the Lord their God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 하나님 여호와의 명령에 순종하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: They did the same bad things
